display_long_description:
Exercise the mind, body & soul in this fast-paced feast of micro challenges, high intensity boss battles and a concoction of collectibles that unravel as you jog across vibrant backdrops of color and joy.

# RUN FOR YOUR LIFE
Get physical with lifelike jog-in-place controls or stick with the less intensive arm-swing mode as you run for your life through the bright and stylish world of madness.

[media]


# MINIGAME MADNESS

Match, Catch, Pop, Chop, Hack, Slash and Bash your way through quick-thinking showdowns that block your path forward to each castle lair!                                

[media]


# HURRY, HURRY, HURRY
It’s a race against time as every passing second drains from the longevity of your beating heart.

[media]


# MASTER THEM ALL
Master all hazard and showdown challenges with the help of collectible character cards found throughout the world. Learn their weakness and let ‘em have it!

[media]


# SUBSTANCE AND STYLE
Unlock hands and tombstones to make a statement during your run, and even after death.

[media]


# LEVEL UP
Spend the RO (Royal Offspring) that you’ve saved from each castle lair on valuable upgrades to increase your sword, shield or heart duration.

[media]

# RUN FOR YOUR LIFE

Match, Catch, Pop, Chop, Hack, Slash and Bash your way through quick-thinking showdowns that block your path forward to each castle lair!                                

![{"height":1080,"type":"image","width":1920}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/86659801_2932247743583077_7417664589811237837_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=PbTrej0FmTUQ7kNvwFbhYR8&_nc_oc=AdmDCRsphqGNBsWTBf4SM3HZ3bPNKlrRJ2CPG2YsvYm6rZg-XEfeg9xI5uUKi-JCmiw&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfF5O4exjGUBo-HArN3NBGnaed1eAXc63BUaluM200oj9Q&oe=6803526A)


# HURRY, HURRY, HURRY
It’s a race against time as every passing second drains from the longevity of your beating heart.

![{"height":984,"type":"image","width":1748}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507165_447221264980420_8367178254206728213_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Iw1m7_lGUxoQ7kNvwGBv8ok&_nc_oc=Adnbou0voDn-0C5jxw56Y3fzUAXcmNdP1hDvRTnG1QYDCaQDbiQ_E1F6JxyGQIpH4VU&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfEu4VEZx23Kztl8t6XRhGkHONMuKoGuuPYWFAq47O9uUQ&oe=68037B12)


# MASTER THEM ALL
Master all hazard and showdown challenges with the help of collectible character cards found throughout the world. Learn their weakness and let ‘em have it!

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57570293_4078635569072597_4548948488473550523_n.png?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=2jAUGIc2DEoQ7kNvwGVoQjF&_nc_oc=AdmbX2jjADPL4VX0zOT_4AiuLy6_2OxofD5e4vwQSsh5pVcGQBgJ9gWodWm5MTr6R2g&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfG4e_O3MihmZqJKjScAGHDXztxYXpns5tJzgFFdTEBfdw&oe=680349AD)


# SUBSTANCE AND STYLE
Unlock hands and tombstones to make a statement during your run, and even after death.

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982723_2208705096178691_3774754884521119372_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=EOq_nSfVTLQQ7kNvwGezI07&_nc_oc=AdksPAqq90kAqpo5j85AMBsdTc7YDKSJK-gAbrPcKxyMG6JF15oHy0mWGHtFQZ3x0MQ&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfEYM4jylPjvgD6QcUtT4xs05eGOu3ua9pUP5ZS2ysjC9w&oe=68035E10)


# LEVEL UP
Spend the RO (Royal Offspring) that you’ve saved from each castle lair on valuable upgrades to increase your sword, shield or heart duration.
